 Allow external CLAUDE.md file imports?

 This project's CLAUDE.md imports files outside the current working directory. Never allow this for third-party repositories.

 External imports:
   /Users/adamwulf/Developer/muse/muse-ios/.ittybitty/STATUS.md

 Important: Only use Claude Code with files you trust.
 Accessing untrusted files may pose security risks https://code.claude.com/docs/en/security

 ❯ 1. Yes, allow external imports
   2. No, disable external imports

 Enter to confirm · Esc to disable external includes
